name: Pilot Escape
description:
Take to the skies and defeat the mysterious and powerful Reclaimers!

The best way to play the game is by downloading it! The graphics will be much better. For the web browser version, the visuals are set to VERY LOW for performance reasons. You can download the .zip from the page, then extract it and run the .exe to play!

If you are having trouble with this version, you can also play it here: https://sharemygame.com/@kgvale/pilot-escape-demo

Please share your feedback in this survey: https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/B35VH7S

And share your score for each level in the comments!

Pilot Escape is a rail shooter about a lone pilot who must uncover the mystery beyond the mountains!

This is the earliest "finished" version of the game. But there is still a lot to be added. Sorry if you find any bugs :)

CONTROLS (Controller recommended, keyboard is available too)

use the MOUSE. ARROW KEYS, or THUMBSTICK to control the menu.

KEYBOARD

WASD to move

SPACE BAR to shoot

CONTROLLER

LEFT THUMBSTICK to move

RIGHT TRIGGER to shoot

CAST

ADMIRAL POUEL - Daniel Poole
